item.title: Welcome
item.description: Welcome to liddicode! The name’s Josh and I am currently a 2nd Year Maths Student with an interest in data science. I’ll be posting projects whenever I have time, but feel free to peruse what’s already here.

item.title: Argus Filch will be the next Dark Lord
item.description: %matplotlib widget from sklearn.cluster import KMeans from copy import deepcopy from scipy.stats import * import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import numpy as np import networkx as nx import seaborn as sns import pandas as pd from sklearn.preprocessing import normalize as nz from graspologic.plot import pairplot_with_gmm from myfuncs import * import seaborn as sns import matplotlib as mpl mpl.rcParams['font.size'] = 20 mpl.rcParams['text.usetex'] = True #mpl.rcParams['text.latex.preamble'] = r'\usepackage{{amsmath}}' mpl.rcParams['text.latex.preamble'] = r'\usepackage{amsmath}' def cartesian_to_spherical(cartesian_vectors): import warnings with warnings.
